name: RightBehindYou
description:
In this game, you are a serial killer and you have to kill your targets in the back !

They can detect you if you are not discreet enough: if you run you will be detected but if you crouch behind objects you won't.

You can't come to close to them. So, how do you kill them ? You have to get their attention to something: in each level you will find a bottle. Take this bottle (LEFT CLICK), throw it (LEFT CLICK) and your target will come to check what is happening. When this happen you can crouch and come at the back of your target to kill it (LEFT CLICK)!

Your first target will be an old person. Your second target will be a guy who loves dogs. Finally, your third target will be someone who loves literature.

Good luck, be as fast as you can !

There are 3 levels and the game is a little buggy.

PS: The build is a development build because the game doesn't load with a normal build.

By Blublub.
